content:
In the evening of March 23, three explosions were raised in the city.

About thisreportedMayor of Kharkiv Igor Terekhov.

“The arrival in the industrial zone of one of the city areas. Fortunately, without the victims. Damaged non -residential building, ”Igor Terekhov wrote.

Asreported the armyinform, in Kharkiv region a man died as a result of Russian shelling.
title: The Russians hit Kharkiv again
description: This was reported by the mayor of Kharkiv Igor Terekhov. “The arrival in the industrial zone of one of ...
author: Army Inform
